website_summaries.verdict: A moderately-priced adjustable, easy-to-use life jacket featuring manual inflation.
pros: The zipper and adjustable strap make this life jacket a quick slip-on
The mesh backing and smooth, lightweight fabric make for a comfortable wearing experience
The product's high density provides extra buoyancy
cons: Smaller users may experience the jacket shifting or riding up as there is no vertical strap to help hold the jacket in place

customer_reviews.title: A boon for a non swimmer snorkel in the ocean.
customer_reviews.text: I had the time of my life snorkeling at Hawaii with this, it was my first time snorkeling and I don’t know how to swim. I followed instructions and was comfortable in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Chaitanya Polumetla

customer_reviews.title: Sticky zipper/Too big
customer_reviews.text: The vest I received had a sticky zipper that I could not easily manipulate and had to have my husband help with. That is not going to work with wet fingers! It was also way to big for a smaller woman and certainly will not fit a 80 pounder like it says! It would have to be blown up so full you wouldn't be able to swim/snorkel. The netting is nice, but over-all, this vest will not work for a smaller person. The cinch at the waist will not keep the vest in place once floating. It wants to ride up. This might work great for a 200 pound man, but not a 120 pound thin woman.
customer_reviews.author: Vdub

customer_reviews.title: Works but sends low quality
customer_reviews.text: while it does the trick, doesn't seem suitable for a long term emergency flotation device. I bought this to keep in my boat workout taking up much space of a full life jacket, but I ended up using it only for kayaking as I can test it before use to ensure it works. Seems flimsy and I wouldn't trust it to work after being in storage without use long term.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable!

This was way more comfortable, so I returned the other one. Mine came with the straps for the legs. Was very easy to use. I was also way less tired after snorkeling every morning. It also helped in taking photos because you could just stop and focus on the picture. Easy to pack too!
